content.text: is designed to generate a report that aggregates energy usage, costs, and CO2 emissions data by energy type for selected facilities. It processes data for a specified billing period and outputs a detailed report including fiscal year comparisons and percentage changes. The procedure handles data for different energy categories, such as total energy in BTUs, electric demand, and CO2 emissions, and formats the results for reporting purposes.

The procedure is complex due to its extensive use of dynamic SQL operations, multiple PIVOT operations, and UNION ALL statements to aggregate and format data from various categories. It also involves intricate logic for calculating year-to-date values and percentage changes, making it challenging to maintain and optimize.
: The email address of the user requesting the report, used for logging purposes.
: The billing period for which the report is generated, formatted as YYYYMM.
: The code representing the agency for which the report is generated.
: A list of facility numbers to include in the report.
: A flag indicating if the user is an agency user, which affects the billing period selection logic.
: The procedure begins by setting the transaction isolation level to READ UNCOMMITTED to avoid locking issues and initializes local variables.
: If the user is an agency user, the procedure retrieves the current processing period from the
: It logs the report request details using the
and adjusts it for fiscal year calculations.
Executes multiple SELECT statements with PIVOT operations to transform monthly data into columns for each month.
Calculates year-to-date values based on the current billing period month.
Formats the results for each category and calculates percentage changes compared to the prior fiscal year.
Outputs the final result set ordered by category and facility number.
: Using READ UNCOMMITTED can improve performance by reducing locking but leads to dirty reads.
: Multiple PIVOT operations can be resource-intensive, especially with large datasets.
: The use of dynamic SQL and UNION ALL can increase complexity and execution time.
: Ensure that the underlying tables have appropriate indexes to optimize JOIN operations and WHERE clause filters.
: READ UNCOMMITTED isolation level may lead to reading uncommitted data, which can affect report accuracy.
: The complexity and number of operations may impact performance as data volume grows.
: The procedure lacks explicit error handling, which could lead to unhandled exceptions.
: Ensure that user inputs are validated to prevent SQL injection, especially with dynamic SQL components.
: The complexity of the procedure makes it difficult to maintain and troubleshoot, requiring careful documentation and testing.

CREATE PROCEDURE [Report].[usp_Published_LookupTotalDollarsBtusAndRunningTotalCO2ByEnergyType_CoreRepForSelFac]
(
	@EmailAddress AS VARCHAR(75)
	,@PublishedBillingPeriod AS VARCHAR(6)
	,@AgencyCode AS VARCHAR(10)
	,@FacilityNumber AS VARCHAR(MAX)
	,@IsAgencyUser AS BIT = 0
)
AS
BEGIN
	SET NOCOUNT ON;
	SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED;

	DECLARE @spname VARCHAR(100) = OBJECT_NAME(@@PROCID), @BillingPeriodMonth AS INT;

	IF (@IsAgencyUser = 1)
	BEGIN
		SELECT @PublishedBillingPeriod = PublishedBillingPeriod FROM Billing.ApplicationTimeFrame WHERE CurrentProcessingPeriod = 'Y';
	END;

	EXEC [Audit].usp_AddReportUsageLog
		@ReportName = @spname,
		@StoredProcName  = @spname,
		@RequestedBy  = @EmailAddress,
		@prmPublishedBillingPeriod = @PublishedBillingPeriod,
		@prmBillingPeriod = NULL,
		@prmAgency_ies = @AgencyCode,
		@prmFacilityNumber_s = @FacilityNumber,
		@prmStartingBillingPeriod = NULL,
		@prmEndingBillingPeriod = NULL;

	SET @BillingPeriodMonth = CAST(SUBSTRING(@PublishedBillingPeriod, 5, 6) AS INT);
	SET @BillingPeriodMonth = CASE WHEN @BillingPeriodMonth <= 6 THEN @BillingPeriodMonth + 12 ELSE @BillingPeriodMonth END;
	
	DECLARE @finalResult TABLE (Category VARCHAR(50)
		,CitywideAgencyOrFacility VARCHAR(2)
		,PublishedBillingPeriod VARCHAR(6)
		,FiscalYear VARCHAR(4)
		,EnergyType VARCHAR(3)
		,AgencyCodeOEC VARCHAR(6)
		,FacilityNumber VARCHAR(7)
		,CurrentFiscalYear VARCHAR(4)
		,PriorFiscalYear VARCHAR(4)
		,PublishedPeriodCurrentFiscalYear VARCHAR(4)
		,PublishedPeriodPriorFiscalYear VARCHAR(4)
		,AgencyName VARCHAR(75)
		,FacilityName VARCHAR(100)
		,Address1 VARCHAR(120)
		,CityPlanningBin VARCHAR(7)
		,Borough VARCHAR(1)
		,[Block] VARCHAR(5)
		,LotNumber VARCHAR(4)
		,SummaryORDetail VARCHAR(1)
		,July BTUEquivalentBig
		,August BTUEquivalentBig
		,September BTUEquivalentBig
		,October BTUEquivalentBig
		,November BTUEquivalentBig
		,December BTUEquivalentBig
		,January BTUEquivalentBig
		,February BTUEquivalentBig
		,March BTUEquivalentBig
		,April BTUEquivalentBig
		,May BTUEquivalentBig
		,June BTUEquivalentBig
		,YearToDate BTUEquivalentBig);

	INSERT INTO @finalResult
	SELECT * FROM (SELECT t.Category,
			t.CitywideAgencyOrFacility,
			t.PublishedBillingPeriod,
			t.FiscalYear,
			t.EnergyType,
			t.AgencyCodeOEC,
			t.FacilityNumber,
			t.CurrentFiscalYear,
			t.PriorFiscalYear,
			t.PublishedPeriodCurrentFiscalYear,
			t.PublishedPeriodPriorFiscalYear,
			t.AgencyName,
			t.FacilityName,
			t.Address1,
			t.CityPlanningBIN,
			t.Borough,
			t.[Block],
			t.LotNumber,
			t.SummaryORDetail,
			t.July,
			t.August,
			t.September,
			t.October,
			t.November,
			t.December,
			t.January,
			t.February,
			t.March,
			t.April,
			t.May,
			t.June,
			CASE WHEN @BillingPeriodMonth >= 7 THEN ISNULL(July, 0) ELSE 0 END
				+ CASE WHEN @BillingPeriodMonth >= 8 THEN ISNULL(August, 0) ELSE 0 END
				+ CASE WHEN @BillingPeriodMonth >= 9 THEN ISNULL(September, 0) ELSE 0 END
				+ CASE WHEN @BillingPeriodMonth >= 10 THEN ISNULL(October, 0) ELSE 0 END
				+ CASE WHEN @BillingPeriodMonth >= 11 THEN ISNULL(November, 0) ELSE 0 END
				+ CASE WHEN @BillingPeriodMonth >= 12 THEN ISNULL(December, 0) ELSE 0 END
				+ CASE WHEN @BillingPeriodMonth >= 13 THEN ISNULL(January, 0) ELSE 0 END
				+ CASE WHEN @BillingPeriodMonth >= 14 THEN ISNULL(February, 0) ELSE 0 END
				+ CASE WHEN @BillingPeriodMonth >= 15 THEN ISNULL(March, 0) ELSE 0 END
				+ CASE WHEN @BillingPeriodMonth >= 16 THEN ISNULL(April, 0) ELSE 0 END
				+ CASE WHEN @BillingPeriodMonth >= 17 THEN ISNULL(May, 0) ELSE 0 END
				+ CASE WHEN @BillingPeriodMonth >= 18 THEN ISNULL(June, 0) ELSE 0 END AS YearToDate
		FROM (SELECT  'Total Energy in Millions of BTUs' AS Category
				,ALSFDBC.CitywideAgencyOrFacility
				,@PublishedBillingPeriod AS PublishedBillingPeriod
				,ALSFDBC.FiscalYear
				,ALSFDBC.EnergyType
				,ALSFDBC.AgencyCodeOEC
				,ALSFDBC.FacilityNumber
				,ALSFDBC.TotalBTU
				,ALSFDBC.[Month]
				,ALSFDBC.CurrentFiscalYear
				,ALSFDBC.PriorFiscalYear
				,ALSFDBC.PublishedPeriodCurrentFiscalYear
				,ALSFDBC.PublishedPeriodPriorFiscalYear
				,AG.AgencyName
				,ALSFDBC.FacilityName
				,ALSFDBC.Address1
				,ALSFDBC.CityPlanningBIN
				,ALSFDBC.Borough
				,ALSFDBC.[Block]
				,ALSFDBC.LotNumber
				,ALSFDBC.SummaryORDetail
			FROM Published.TemporalAccountLevelSummaryForDollarsBtusAndCo2 AS ALSFDBC
				INNER JOIN Billing.uftn_TableGetOECFacilityNumberByAgencyHierarchy(@AgencyCode, @FacilityNumber, @EmailAddress) AS AG
					ON ALSFDBC.AgencyCodeOEC = AG.AgencyCodeOEC AND ALSFDBC.FacilityNumber = AG.OecFacilityNumber
			WHERE ALSFDBC.CitywideAgencyOrFacility = 'FA'
				AND ALSFDBC.EffectiveStartPeriod <= @PublishedBillingPeriod AND ALSFDBC.EffectiveEndPeriod > @PublishedBillingPeriod
				AND ALSFDBC.FiscalYear >= dbo.CalculatePreviousFiscalYear(@PublishedBillingPeriod)) AS x
		PIVOT (SUM(TotalBTU) FOR [Month] IN (July, August, September, October, November, December
			,January, February, March, April, May, June)) AS t
		UNION ALL
		SELECT *,
			CASE WHEN @BillingPeriodMonth >= 7 THEN ISNULL(July, 0) ELSE 0 END
				+ CASE WHEN @BillingPeriodMonth >= 8 THEN ISNULL(August, 0) ELSE 0 END
				+ CASE WHEN @BillingPeriodMonth >= 9 THEN ISNULL(September, 0) ELSE 0 END
				+ CASE WHEN @BillingPeriodMonth >= 10 THEN ISNULL(October, 0) ELSE 0 END
				+ CASE WHEN @BillingPeriodMonth >= 11 THEN ISNULL(November, 0) ELSE 0 END
				+ CASE WHEN @BillingPeriodMonth >= 12 THEN ISNULL(December, 0) ELSE 0 END
				+ CASE WHEN @BillingPeriodMonth >= 13 THEN ISNULL(January, 0) ELSE 0 END
				+ CASE WHEN @BillingPeriodMonth >= 14 THEN ISNULL(February, 0) ELSE 0 END
				+ CASE WHEN @BillingPeriodMonth >= 15 THEN ISNULL(March, 0) ELSE 0 END
				+ CASE WHEN @BillingPeriodMonth >= 16 THEN ISNULL(April, 0) ELSE 0 END
				+ CASE WHEN @BillingPeriodMonth >= 17 THEN ISNULL(May, 0) ELSE 0 END
				+ CASE WHEN @BillingPeriodMonth >= 18 THEN ISNULL(June, 0) ELSE 0 END AS YearToDate
		FROM (SELECT 'Electric Demand (kW)' AS Category
				,ALSFDBC.CitywideAgencyOrFacility
				,@PublishedBillingPeriod AS PublishedBillingPeriod
				,ALSFDBC.FiscalYear
				,ALSFDBC.EnergyType
				,ALSFDBC.AgencyCodeOEC
				,ALSFDBC.FacilityNumber
				,ALSFDBC.[Month]
				,ALSFDBC.CurrentFiscalYear
				,ALSFDBC.PriorFiscalYear
				,ALSFDBC.DemandUsage
				,ALSFDBC.PublishedPeriodCurrentFiscalYear
				,ALSFDBC.PublishedPeriodPriorFiscalYear
				,AG.AgencyName
				,ALSFDBC.FacilityName
				,ALSFDBC.Address1
				,ALSFDBC.CityPlanningBIN
				,ALSFDBC.Borough
				,ALSFDBC.[Block]
				,ALSFDBC.LotNumber
				,ALSFDBC.SummaryORDetail
			FROM Published.TemporalAccountLevelSummaryForDollarsBtusAndCo2 AS ALSFDBC
				INNER JOIN Billing.uftn_TableGetOECFacilityNumberByAgencyHierarchy(@AgencyCode, @FacilityNumber, @EmailAddress) AS AG
					ON ALSFDBC.AgencyCodeOEC = AG.AgencyCodeOEC AND ALSFDBC.FacilityNumber = AG.OecFacilityNumber
			WHERE ALSFDBC.CitywideAgencyOrFacility = 'FE'
				AND ALSFDBC.EffectiveStartPeriod <= @PublishedBillingPeriod
				AND ALSFDBC.EffectiveEndPeriod > @PublishedBillingPeriod
				AND ALSFDBC.FiscalYear >= dbo.CalculatePreviousFiscalYear(@PublishedBillingPeriod)
				AND ALSFDBC.EnergyType ='ELE') AS x
			PIVOT (SUM(DemandUsage) FOR [Month] IN (July, August, September, October, November, December
				,January, February, March, April, May, June)) AS t
		UNION ALL
		SELECT *,
			CASE WHEN @BillingPeriodMonth >= 7 THEN ISNULL(July, 0) ELSE 0 END
				+ CASE WHEN @BillingPeriodMonth >= 8 THEN ISNULL(August, 0) ELSE 0 END
				+ CASE WHEN @BillingPeriodMonth >= 9 THEN ISNULL(September, 0) ELSE 0 END
				+ CASE WHEN @BillingPeriodMonth >= 10 THEN ISNULL(October, 0) ELSE 0 END
				+ CASE WHEN @BillingPeriodMonth >= 11 THEN ISNULL(November, 0) ELSE 0 END
				+ CASE WHEN @BillingPeriodMonth >= 12 THEN ISNULL(December, 0) ELSE 0 END
				+ CASE WHEN @BillingPeriodMonth >= 13 THEN ISNULL(January, 0) ELSE 0 END
				+ CASE WHEN @BillingPeriodMonth >= 14 THEN ISNULL(February, 0) ELSE 0 END
				+ CASE WHEN @BillingPeriodMonth >= 15 THEN ISNULL(March, 0) ELSE 0 END
				+ CASE WHEN @BillingPeriodMonth >= 16 THEN ISNULL(April, 0) ELSE 0 END
				+ CASE WHEN @BillingPeriodMonth >= 17 THEN ISNULL(May, 0) ELSE 0 END
				+ CASE WHEN @BillingPeriodMonth >= 18 THEN ISNULL(June, 0) ELSE 0 END AS YearToDate
		FROM (SELECT CASE WHEN ALSFDBC.EnergyType ='ELE' THEN 'Electric consumption (kWh)'
					WHEN ALSFDBC.EnergyType ='GAS' THEN 'Natural gas (Therms)'
					WHEN ALSFDBC.EnergyType ='STM' THEN 'Steam (MLbs)'
					ELSE 'Other' END AS Category
				,ALSFDBC.CitywideAgencyOrFacility
				,@PublishedBillingPeriod AS PublishedBillingPeriod
				,ALSFDBC.FiscalYear
				,ALSFDBC.EnergyType
				,ALSFDBC.AgencyCodeOEC
				,ALSFDBC.FacilityNumber
				,ALSFDBC.[Month]
				,ALSFDBC.CurrentFiscalYear
				,ALSFDBC.PriorFiscalYear
				,ALSFDBC.EnergyUsage
				,ALSFDBC.PublishedPeriodCurrentFiscalYear
				,ALSFDBC.PublishedPeriodPriorFiscalYear
				,AG.AgencyName
				,ALSFDBC.FacilityName
				,ALSFDBC.Address1
				,ALSFDBC.CityPlanningBIN
				,ALSFDBC.Borough
				,ALSFDBC.[Block]
				,ALSFDBC.LotNumber
				,ALSFDBC.SummaryORDetail
			FROM Published.TemporalAccountLevelSummaryForDollarsBtusAndCo2 AS ALSFDBC
				INNER JOIN Billing.uftn_TableGetOECFacilityNumberByAgencyHierarchy(@AgencyCode, @FacilityNumber, @EmailAddress) AS AG
					ON ALSFDBC.AgencyCodeOEC = AG.AgencyCodeOEC AND ALSFDBC.FacilityNumber = AG.OecFacilityNumber
			WHERE ALSFDBC.CitywideAgencyOrFacility = 'FE'
				AND ALSFDBC.EffectiveStartPeriod <= @PublishedBillingPeriod AND ALSFDBC.EffectiveEndPeriod > @PublishedBillingPeriod
				AND ALSFDBC.FiscalYear >= dbo.CalculatePreviousFiscalYear(@PublishedBillingPeriod)) AS x
			PIVOT (SUM(EnergyUsage) FOR [Month] IN (July, August, September, October, November, December
				,January, February, March, April, May, June)) AS t
		UNION ALL
		SELECT *,
			CASE WHEN @BillingPeriodMonth >= 7 THEN ISNULL(July, 0) ELSE 0 END
				+ CASE WHEN @BillingPeriodMonth >= 8 THEN ISNULL(August, 0) ELSE 0 END
				+ CASE WHEN @BillingPeriodMonth >= 9 THEN ISNULL(September, 0) ELSE 0 END
				+ CASE WHEN @BillingPeriodMonth >= 10 THEN ISNULL(October, 0) ELSE 0 END
				+ CASE WHEN @BillingPeriodMonth >= 11 THEN ISNULL(November, 0) ELSE 0 END
				+ CASE WHEN @BillingPeriodMonth >= 12 THEN ISNULL(December, 0) ELSE 0 END
				+ CASE WHEN @BillingPeriodMonth >= 13 THEN ISNULL(January, 0) ELSE 0 END
				+ CASE WHEN @BillingPeriodMonth >= 14 THEN ISNULL(February, 0) ELSE 0 END
				+ CASE WHEN @BillingPeriodMonth >= 15 THEN ISNULL(March, 0) ELSE 0 END
				+ CASE WHEN @BillingPeriodMonth >= 16 THEN ISNULL(April, 0) ELSE 0 END
				+ CASE WHEN @BillingPeriodMonth >= 17 THEN ISNULL(May, 0) ELSE 0 END
				+ CASE WHEN @BillingPeriodMonth >= 18 THEN ISNULL(June, 0) ELSE 0 END AS YearToDate
		FROM (SELECT CASE WHEN ALSFDBC.EnergyType ='BTU' AND ALSFDBC.CitywideAgencyOrFacility = 'FA' THEN 'Total Cost'
					WHEN ALSFDBC.EnergyType ='ELE' AND ALSFDBC.CitywideAgencyOrFacility = 'FE' THEN 'Electricity Cost'
					WHEN ALSFDBC.EnergyType ='GAS' AND ALSFDBC.CitywideAgencyOrFacility = 'FE' THEN 'Natural Gas Cost'
					WHEN ALSFDBC.EnergyType ='STM' AND ALSFDBC.CitywideAgencyOrFacility = 'FE' THEN 'Steam Cost'
					ELSE 'Other' END AS Category
				,ALSFDBC.CitywideAgencyOrFacility
				,@PublishedBillingPeriod AS PublishedBillingPeriod
				,ALSFDBC.FiscalYear
				,ALSFDBC.EnergyType
				,ALSFDBC.AgencyCodeOEC
				,ALSFDBC.FacilityNumber
				,ALSFDBC.TotalBilledAmount
				,ALSFDBC.[Month]
				,ALSFDBC.CurrentFiscalYear
				,ALSFDBC.PriorFiscalYear
				,ALSFDBC.PublishedPeriodCurrentFiscalYear
				,ALSFDBC.PublishedPeriodPriorFiscalYear
				,AG.AgencyName
				,ALSFDBC.FacilityName
				,ALSFDBC.Address1
				,ALSFDBC.CityPlanningBIN
				,ALSFDBC.Borough
				,ALSFDBC.[Block]
				,ALSFDBC.LotNumber
				,ALSFDBC.SummaryORDetail
			FROM Published.TemporalAccountLevelSummaryForDollarsBtusAndCo2 AS ALSFDBC
				INNER JOIN Billing.uftn_TableGetOECFacilityNumberByAgencyHierarchy(@AgencyCode, @FacilityNumber, @EmailAddress) AS AG
				ON ALSFDBC.AgencyCodeOEC = AG.AgencyCodeOEC AND ALSFDBC.FacilityNumber = AG.OecFacilityNumber
			WHERE ALSFDBC.CitywideAgencyOrFacility IN ('FE','FA')
				AND ALSFDBC.EffectiveStartPeriod <= @PublishedBillingPeriod AND ALSFDBC.EffectiveEndPeriod > @PublishedBillingPeriod
				AND ALSFDBC.FiscalYear >= dbo.CalculatePreviousFiscalYear(@PublishedBillingPeriod)) AS x
			PIVOT (SUM(TotalBilledAmount) FOR [Month] IN (July, August, September, October, November, December
				,January, February, March, April, May, June)) AS t
		UNION ALL
		SELECT *,
			CASE WHEN @BillingPeriodMonth >= 7 THEN ISNULL(July, 0) ELSE 0 END
				+ CASE WHEN @BillingPeriodMonth >= 8 THEN ISNULL(August, 0) ELSE 0 END
				+ CASE WHEN @BillingPeriodMonth >= 9 THEN ISNULL(September, 0) ELSE 0 END
				+ CASE WHEN @BillingPeriodMonth >= 10 THEN ISNULL(October, 0) ELSE 0 END
				+ CASE WHEN @BillingPeriodMonth >= 11 THEN ISNULL(November, 0) ELSE 0 END
				+ CASE WHEN @BillingPeriodMonth >= 12 THEN ISNULL(December, 0) ELSE 0 END
				+ CASE WHEN @BillingPeriodMonth >= 13 THEN ISNULL(January, 0) ELSE 0 END
				+ CASE WHEN @BillingPeriodMonth >= 14 THEN ISNULL(February, 0) ELSE 0 END
				+ CASE WHEN @BillingPeriodMonth >= 15 THEN ISNULL(March, 0) ELSE 0 END
				+ CASE WHEN @BillingPeriodMonth >= 16 THEN ISNULL(April, 0) ELSE 0 END
				+ CASE WHEN @BillingPeriodMonth >= 17 THEN ISNULL(May, 0) ELSE 0 END
				+ CASE WHEN @BillingPeriodMonth >= 18 THEN ISNULL(June, 0) ELSE 0 END AS YearToDate
		FROM (SELECT 'CO2e Emissions (FY Cumulative)' AS Category
				,ALSFDBC.CitywideAgencyOrFacility
				,@PublishedBillingPeriod AS PublishedBillingPeriod
				,ALSFDBC.FiscalYear
				,ALSFDBC.EnergyType
				,ALSFDBC.AgencyCodeOEC
				,ALSFDBC.FacilityNumber
				,ALSFDBC.PublishedBillingPeriodRunningTotalCO2
				,ALSFDBC.[Month]
				,ALSFDBC.CurrentFiscalYear
				,ALSFDBC.PriorFiscalYear
				,ALSFDBC.PublishedPeriodCurrentFiscalYear
				,ALSFDBC.PublishedPeriodPriorFiscalYear
				,AG.AgencyName
				,ALSFDBC.FacilityName
				,ALSFDBC.Address1
				,ALSFDBC.CityPlanningBIN
				,ALSFDBC.Borough
				,ALSFDBC.[Block]
				,ALSFDBC.LotNumber
				,ALSFDBC.SummaryORDetail
			FROM Published.TemporalAccountLevelSummaryForDollarsBtusAndCo2 AS ALSFDBC
				INNER JOIN Billing.uftn_TableGetOECFacilityNumberByAgencyHierarchy(@AgencyCode, @FacilityNumber, @EmailAddress) AS AG
					ON ALSFDBC.AgencyCodeOEC = AG.AgencyCodeOEC AND ALSFDBC.FacilityNumber = AG.OecFacilityNumber
			WHERE ALSFDBC.CitywideAgencyOrFacility = 'FA'
				AND ALSFDBC.EffectiveStartPeriod <= @PublishedBillingPeriod AND ALSFDBC.EffectiveEndPeriod > @PublishedBillingPeriod
				AND ALSFDBC.FiscalYear >= dbo.CalculatePreviousFiscalYear(@PublishedBillingPeriod)) AS x
		PIVOT (SUM(PublishedBillingPeriodRunningTotalCO2) FOR [Month] IN (July, August, September, October, November, December
			,January, February, March, April, May, June)) AS t
		) AS fResult

	SELECT * FROM (SELECT fn.Category
			 ,fn.CitywideAgencyOrFacility
			 ,fn.PublishedBillingPeriod
			 ,fn.FiscalYear
			 ,'FY ' + fn.FiscalYear AS FiscalYearDisplay
			 ,fn.EnergyType
			 ,fn.AgencyCodeOEC
			 ,fn.FacilityNumber
			 ,fn.CurrentFiscalYear
			 ,fn.PriorFiscalYear
			 ,fn.PublishedPeriodCurrentFiscalYear
			 ,fn.PublishedPeriodPriorFiscalYear
			 ,fn.AgencyName
			 ,fn.FacilityName
			 ,fn.Address1
			 ,fn.CityPlanningBIN
			 ,fn.Borough
			 ,fn.[Block]
			 ,fn.LotNumber
			 ,fn.SummaryORDetail
			 ,CASE WHEN fn.Category IN ('Total Cost', 'Electricity Cost', 'Natural Gas Cost', 'Steam Cost','Other') THEN FORMAT(fn.July, 'N2')
				ELSE FORMAT(fn.July, 'N2') END July
			 ,CASE WHEN fn.Category IN ('Total Cost', 'Electricity Cost', 'Natural Gas Cost', 'Steam Cost','Other') THEN FORMAT(fn.August, 'N2')
				ELSE FORMAT(fn.August, 'N2') END AS August
			 ,CASE WHEN fn.Category IN ('Total Cost', 'Electricity Cost', 'Natural Gas Cost', 'Steam Cost','Other') THEN FORMAT(fn.September, 'N2')
				ELSE FORMAT(fn.September, 'N2') END AS September
			 ,CASE WHEN fn.Category IN ('Total Cost', 'Electricity Cost', 'Natural Gas Cost', 'Steam Cost','Other') THEN FORMAT(fn.October, 'N2')
				ELSE FORMAT(fn.October, 'N2') END AS October
			 ,CASE WHEN fn.Category IN ('Total Cost', 'Electricity Cost', 'Natural Gas Cost', 'Steam Cost','Other') THEN FORMAT(fn.November, 'N2')
				ELSE FORMAT(fn.November, 'N2') END AS November
			 ,CASE WHEN fn.Category IN ('Total Cost', 'Electricity Cost', 'Natural Gas Cost', 'Steam Cost','Other') THEN FORMAT(fn.December, 'N2')
				ELSE FORMAT(fn.December, 'N2') END AS December
			 ,CASE WHEN fn.Category IN ('Total Cost', 'Electricity Cost', 'Natural Gas Cost', 'Steam Cost','Other') THEN FORMAT(fn.January, 'N2')
				ELSE FORMAT(fn.January, 'N2') END AS January
			 ,CASE WHEN fn.Category IN ('Total Cost', 'Electricity Cost', 'Natural Gas Cost', 'Steam Cost','Other') THEN FORMAT(fn.February, 'N2')
				ELSE FORMAT(fn.February, 'N2') END AS February
			 ,CASE WHEN fn.Category IN ('Total Cost', 'Electricity Cost', 'Natural Gas Cost', 'Steam Cost','Other') THEN FORMAT(fn.March, 'N2')
				ELSE FORMAT(fn.March, 'N2') END AS March
			 ,CASE WHEN fn.Category IN ('Total Cost', 'Electricity Cost', 'Natural Gas Cost', 'Steam Cost','Other') THEN FORMAT(fn.April, 'N2')
				ELSE FORMAT(fn.April, 'N2') END AS April
			 ,CASE WHEN fn.Category IN ('Total Cost', 'Electricity Cost', 'Natural Gas Cost', 'Steam Cost','Other') THEN FORMAT(fn.May, 'N2')
				ELSE FORMAT(fn.May, 'N2') END AS May
			 ,CASE WHEN fn.Category IN ('Total Cost', 'Electricity Cost', 'Natural Gas Cost', 'Steam Cost','Other') THEN FORMAT(fn.June, 'N2')
				ELSE FORMAT(fn.June, 'N2') END AS June 
			 ,CASE WHEN fn.Category IN ('Total Cost', 'Electricity Cost', 'Natural Gas Cost', 'Steam Cost','Other') THEN FORMAT(fn.YearToDate, 'N2')
				ELSE FORMAT(fn.YearToDate, 'N2') END AS YearToDate
		FROM @finalResult fn
		UNION
		SELECT cur.Category
			,cur.CitywideAgencyOrFacility
			,cur.PublishedBillingPeriod
			,'% Change' AS FiscalYear
			,'% Change' AS FiscalYearDisplay
			,cur.EnergyType
			,cur.AgencyCodeOEC
			,cur.FacilityNumber
			,cur.CurrentFiscalYear
			,cur.PriorFiscalYear
			,cur.PublishedPeriodCurrentFiscalYear
			,cur.PublishedPeriodPriorFiscalYear
			,cur.AgencyName
			,cur.FacilityName
			,cur.Address1
			,cur.CityPlanningBIN
			,cur.Borough
			,cur.[Block]
			,cur.LotNumber
			,cur.SummaryORDetail
			,FORMAT( 100 * CASE WHEN ISNULL(pri.July, 0) = 0 THEN NULL
				ELSE (ISNULL(pri.July, 0) - ISNULL(cur.July, 0)) / CASE WHEN ISNULL(cur.July, 0) = 0 THEN 1 ELSE cur.July END END, 'N1') AS July
			,FORMAT( 100 * CASE WHEN ISNULL(pri.August, 0) = 0 THEN NULL
				ELSE (ISNULL(pri.August, 0) - ISNULL(cur.August, 0)) / CASE WHEN ISNULL(cur.August, 0) = 0 THEN 1 ELSE cur.August END END, 'N1') AS August
			,FORMAT( 100 * CASE WHEN ISNULL(pri.September, 0) = 0 THEN NULL
				ELSE (ISNULL(pri.September, 0) - ISNULL(cur.September, 0) ) / CASE WHEN ISNULL(cur.September, 0) = 0 THEN 1 ELSE cur.September END END, 'N1') AS September
			,FORMAT( 100 * CASE WHEN ISNULL(pri.October, 0) = 0 THEN NULL
				ELSE (ISNULL(pri.October, 0) - ISNULL(cur.October, 0)) / CASE WHEN ISNULL(cur.October, 0) = 0 THEN 1 ELSE cur.October END END, 'N1') AS October
			,FORMAT( 100 * CASE WHEN ISNULL(pri.November, 0) = 0 THEN NULL
				ELSE (ISNULL(pri.November, 0) - ISNULL(cur.November, 0)) / CASE WHEN ISNULL(cur.November, 0) = 0 THEN 1 ELSE cur.November END END, 'N1') AS November
			,FORMAT( 100 * CASE WHEN ISNULL(pri.December, 0) = 0 THEN NULL
				ELSE (ISNULL(pri.December, 0) - ISNULL(cur.December, 0)) / CASE WHEN ISNULL(cur.December, 0) = 0 THEN 1 ELSE cur.December END END, 'N1') AS December
			,FORMAT( 100 * CASE WHEN ISNULL(pri.January, 0) = 0 THEN NULL
				ELSE (ISNULL(pri.January, 0) - ISNULL(cur.January, 0)) / CASE WHEN ISNULL(cur.January, 0) = 0 THEN 1 ELSE cur.January END END, 'N1') AS January
			,FORMAT( 100 * CASE WHEN ISNULL(pri.February, 0) = 0 THEN NULL
				ELSE (ISNULL(pri.February, 0) - ISNULL(cur.February, 0)) / CASE WHEN ISNULL(cur.February, 0) = 0 THEN 1 ELSE cur.February END END, 'N1') AS February
			,FORMAT( 100 * CASE WHEN ISNULL(pri.March, 0) = 0 THEN NULL
				ELSE (ISNULL(pri.March, 0) - ISNULL(cur.March, 0)) / CASE WHEN ISNULL(cur.March, 0) = 0 THEN 1 ELSE cur.March END END, 'N1') AS March
			,FORMAT( 100 * CASE WHEN ISNULL(pri.April, 0) = 0 THEN NULL
				ELSE (ISNULL(pri.April, 0) - ISNULL(cur.April, 0)) / CASE WHEN ISNULL(cur.April, 0) = 0 THEN 1 ELSE cur.April END END, 'N1') AS April
			,FORMAT( 100 * CASE WHEN ISNULL(pri.May, 0) = 0 THEN NULL
				ELSE (ISNULL(pri.May, 0) - ISNULL(cur.May, 0)) / CASE WHEN ISNULL(cur.May, 0) = 0 THEN 1 ELSE cur.May END END, 'N1') AS May
			,FORMAT( 100 * CASE WHEN ISNULL(pri.June, 0) = 0 THEN NULL
				ELSE (ISNULL(pri.June, 0) - ISNULL(cur.June, 0) ) / CASE WHEN ISNULL(cur.June, 0) = 0 THEN 1 ELSE cur.June END END, 'N1') AS June
			,FORMAT( 100 * CASE WHEN ISNULL(pri.YearToDate, 0) = 0 THEN NULL
				ELSE (ISNULL(pri.YearToDate, 0) - ISNULL(cur.YearToDate, 0)) / CASE WHEN ISNULL(cur.YearToDate, 0) = 0 THEN 1 ELSE cur.YearToDate END END, 'N1') AS YearToDate
		FROM (SELECT * FROM @finalResult WHERE PublishedPeriodCurrentFiscalYear = CurrentFiscalYear) AS pri
			INNER JOIN (SELECT * FROM @finalResult WHERE PublishedPeriodPriorFiscalYear = CurrentFiscalYear) AS cur ON pri.Category = cur.Category
				AND pri.EnergyType = cur.EnergyType AND pri.FacilityNumber = cur.FacilityNumber
		) AS frs
	ORDER BY frs.Category, frs.FacilityNumber, frs.FiscalYear DESC;
END;
